ProcessDefinition.Title: Clean Data Service
ProcessDefinition.Abstract: <DESCRIPTION> Clean Data service represents Rest and WPS end point for hoot cleanup which is defined as cleanup (input) (output) Removes common erroneous data scenarios from input and writes to output. * input - Input (e.g. .osm file). * output - Output file (e.g. .osm file) </DESCRIPTION> <EXAMPLE> <URL>http://localhost:8080/hoot-services/ogc</URL> <REQUEST_TYPE>POST</REQUEST_TYPE> <INPUT>Please refer to the wiki page: https://insightcloud.digitalglobe.com/redmine/projects/hootenany/wiki/User_-_Data_Cleaning_Service</INPUT> <OUTPUT>Please refer to the wiki page: https://insightcloud.digitalglobe.com/redmine/projects/hootenany/wiki/User_-_Data_Cleaning_Service</OUTPUT> </EXAMPLE>

LiteralInput.Title: INPUT
LiteralInput.Abstract: When DB Type then name of the map record. If OSM then the relative (to HOOT_HOME) path of osm file.

LiteralInput.Title: OUTPUT
LiteralInput.Abstract: When DB Type then name of the map record. If OSM then the relative (to HOOT_HOME) path of output osm file.
